thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Joe
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Joe

author: Joe
title: Joe
text: The lobster meat I ordered (mix of tail/claw meat) was tasty, but I expected close to a 50/50 mix of tail to claw meat. Unfortunately, my order was more like 85% tail to 15% claw meat. Both were fine, but the website suggested the mix is traditionally used for lobster sandwiches. My assumption of 50/50 was incorrect.
